website_summaries.verdict: Z-Athletic's improved gymnastic bar has greater stability, providing an affordable option for a level 3 or 4 gymnast.
pros: The steel legs and rail are welded together so assembly only requires 10 bolts and a wrench
The bar has a fiberglass core for strength and flexibility, while the height can be adjusted from 36 to 58 inches
The unit comes with a warranty that covers breakage within the first 2 years
cons: The kip bar may rock during powerful moves, making the additional purchase of an extension kit a necessity for more advance gymnasts

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to getting this bar for my little gymnast. The instructions were easy to follow and it took only a few minutes to setup. Pretty strudy construction. Bought this mostly because it was in my budget but was surprised at how good it actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Sun xiaomeng

customer_reviews.title: Very great bar! I have a 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Very great bar! I have a 3 year old, and 10 year old in gymnastics. Love that it is adjustable. Very durable and was easy for my husband to assemble. Their gymnastics teacher also approved. I have bought several items from z-athletics, and am pleased with all! I would recommend purchasing a 2 inch thick mat to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Koenig

customer_reviews.title: The quality is awesome and we are very happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our four year, who just started competitive gymnastics. She plays on this bar probably 2 hours every night since she got it. Her bar skills have improved sooo much. We bought some cheap exercise pads from Walmart to put under the bar because when they land on those metal frame parts it hurt. See pictures below. The quality is awesome and we are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Vochatzer

customer_reviews.title: Really good bar only complaint is that if u r trying ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good bar only complaint is that if u r trying to do a powerful skill it rocks a bit so I would recommend getting weights or sandbags to put on the legs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product was missing parts
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our daughter for her birthday. We thought it would be an awesome gift and wanted to see her excitement when she arrived home from school. We couldn't finish putting it together as it was missing screws. We reached out to the company on May 18, 2018 about this and they stated they would mail them right out... We still haven't received them. We had to purchase them so our daughter could enjoy her gift. Nice bar, but disappointing experience overall.
customer_reviews.author: anthony s

customer_reviews.title: Great price packaged well
customer_reviews.text: Seems of good quality. The reason for 4 stars is he need to drill my own hole for proper fitment of the bolt that connects the bar to the side support. Arrived fast all at the same time( I had read prior reviews of separate day packages). Packed well no damage. I would for sure by again like I said the quality is pretty good the only reason for four stars is due to one whole not lining up which isnt A big deal for me, for me but could be a big deal for others. Overall I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 7 year old gymnast
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 7 year old gymnast that weighs about 50 lbs. it is sturdy and the adjustable height allows her to practice in her room or a larger area.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: VERY sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was bigger than I thought it would be. VERY sturdy and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Becca G

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well made!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!! Our kids use this daily since we got it. Sturdy and well made! It’s been used by our kids, friends and family (ages range from 3 years old to 12 years old). The three year old just swings but thinks it is the coolest thing ever. The older kids go flips and tricks. I was able to do a flip- got really dizzy and will not be flipping again but not because the bar won’t hold me!! We purchased a folding mat 4’x8’x2” thick to put underneath. It is the perfect size and the padding is just the right amount. I would recommend this and purchase it again! Very surprised by and happy with the quality!!
customer_reviews.author: InJesus'Hands

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bar and my daughter loves it. I wasn't expecting it to be as big as it is, but I should have measured. My only complaint is that the directions had no pictures and we had to take it apart and put it back together when we realized we made a mistake early on.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Wierd pin knob to adjust height and customer care team’s not responding
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the seller is not responding my email, I cannot still figure out how to use the pin knob to adjust height. When I spin, the pink knob part is spinning itself, and it’s almost impossible to screw the pin in or out. Also, it doesn’t seem new when I first open the package. Pink paintings were peeled off, and the white parts were rubbed off.
customer_reviews.author: makeawish

customer_reviews.title: Overall its a great product the reason I did not give it a ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall its a great product the reason I did not give it a 5 star is because the bar becomes a little unstable when you raise it to the highest height.
customer_reviews.author: Latril

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews so if you are considering purchasing this you should explore other options. After putting this together, the knobs busted and it makes it extremely difficult to adjust the height. Also, this bar not sturdy. My daughter cannot even practice some of her skills because the bar shakes and tilts. She is scared to use it because it is so wobbly. I would not recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old uses this sturdy bar daily. Only con is the instructions on putting it together was worthless so putting it together took a few hours
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shippment for Christmas. All parts were there. Easy to put together. Girls ABSOULETLY LOVE IT. 9 and 10 year old are able to do mostly what they want. It does get some movement when bar is raised. For the most part is STABLE. Reason I gave 4 stars the bolts in the center section are short and barely got couple treads on. Recommend getting 4 bolts little longer
customer_reviews.author: Darren Allen

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty good bars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old daughter for Christmas who is in gymnastics and needed work on her bar work. These are pretty good bars. They are much more study than I thought they would be when putting them together. It's nice how the bars adjust a huge distance so as your child grows or advances you can up the bar height and they will last a while. It says the weight capacity is 130 lbs but my husband who is 165 lbs even flipped on it without a problem. Only reason I didn't give a 5 star is the instructions it came with were horrible. Not very descriptive and no pictures. We eventually figured it out though.
customer_reviews.author: Jag

customer_reviews.title: Broken plastic piece that makes the unit unadjustable
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Z ATHLETIC Gymnastics Expandable Kip Bar in August of 2018 for our toddlers for random in-home use. Recently the plastic piece on one of the sides that allows us to adjust the height of the bar came off. The plastic piece is intact and there is now a metal piece stuck inside. We can no longer adjust the height of our bar. We have reached out to the company two times in the last month (gave them time to respond given the current pandemic) and have received no response. Extremely disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: amazon-customer-unit

customer_reviews.title: Slippery bar
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this bar if you are expecting it to look like a gym bar. It is slippery. I was a gymnast, so I know what the bar should look and feel like, and I was disappointed when I saw this bar. The holes did not line up and were a pain to deal with! The nuts barely screw on and in fact one didn’t. We returned it and went for the elite version bc the bar has a wood finish...crossing our fingers we don’t have the same problems.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Good buy minus paint chipping after assembly and before first use
customer_reviews.text: Paint is chipping after assembly but it’s been good otherwise. An adult pretty much must raise or lower the bar because it is so difficult to raise. Heck, i need my husband to do it most of the time but it’s sturdy and my daughter loves it. I can see she’ll be getting lots of use from it for at home training
customer_reviews.author: Sara Collins

customer_reviews.title: Solid, high quality product
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our gymnastics-loving preteen. She loves it. It was easy to assemble (I did it alone in about 20 minutes, even counting the time to find the necessary tools) and feels very sturdy. Be sure you have a mat (or two!) for underneath, but otherwise you can set it up and go.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great bar for beginner gymnast. Be careful when adjusting height as knobs may break
customer_reviews.text: I love that my daughter loves this bar. She is on it EVERY DAY! We saw a huge improvement in her abilities & strength in just one week of having it. I am disappointed that one of the side pegs (plastic knob) broke off at the slightest adjustment. That happened within a couple of days of getting it. The bar is still functional for up/down height movement but the broken side is jagged. Instructions were easy to follow and delivery was quicker than anticipated. Four stars only because of the broken piece.
customer_reviews.author: JBarSC

customer_reviews.title: A must!
customer_reviews.text: This!!! This is so awesome! And VERY sturdy!! My Husband can use this not a problem. My daughter is IN LOVE with this! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: MrsHartman

customer_reviews.title: Received a used product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, except the one we just received was used. The paint was scratched off in several places and the pieces to put it together were scattered around the box. This clearly was a return from a prior customer. For over $200, i would expect a new product in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bar for my new gymnast as her Christmas present. I opened the two boxes which were both trashed and barely being held together by the plastic strap. When I opened it all up there were no instructions and no hardware to put it together. Now I have her main gift sitting in pieces. This is absolutely horrible. I need the hard wear to put it together immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Markovich

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but piece came broken
customer_reviews.text: The one knob on the bars was broken and it’s obvious it was “glued” together and mailed out to us. We purchased This new and hope to have this piece replaced since we haven’t used the bars yet. It was a Christmas gift for our daughter
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Side knob was broken on day 1
customer_reviews.text: The horizontal bar is smooth. Height adjustment is slightly difficult. The plastic knobs on sides for height adjustment were weak. One got broken. There is a little shake while my kids do monkeying
customer_reviews.author: Raghu kolukuluri

customer_reviews.title: and assembly was very easy. Good quality and she absolutely LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old wanted this for Christmas. We received it quickly, and assembly was very easy. Good quality and she absolutely LOVES it. Our 11 and 13 year old use it as well with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bar!
customer_reviews.text: This bar is awesome. It is very sturdy and my kids have not stopped flipping on it. It was supposed to be my daughters big Christmas present, but because of the large writing on the box Christmas came early. If I had a bigger house I would purchase another one!

customer_reviews.title: Best for the Money very Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my level 3 gymnast that is 9 years old. This is perfect for her needs. I am guessing this will take her through level 5. This is no doubt the best bang for you buck. Very easy to assemble if you are even slightly mechanically inclined.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua R. Sulak

customer_reviews.title: So far it’s durable & safe
customer_reviews.text: My grand-daughter screamed w/ joy when she saw I bought this for her birthday. So far it’s durable and safe, is being by 12 & 14-yr-olds.
customer_reviews.author: J. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy! More than worth the money

customer_reviews.title: Works great for what I needed it for
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. She’s 9yo 65lbs, level 5 and uses it for strength training. I have to put sandbags on it if she wants to work on anything like her kip but for what she wanted it for, works great. It moves too much without stability if you’re child is higher level and needs to work on back/front hip circle or mill circle, ect.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't put this up fast enough! Some difficult putting it together because of undrilled holes and their weren't enough washers. But ultimately my daughter loved it and that's what mattered...

customer_reviews.title: No manuel, the base pieces did not fit. ...
customer_reviews.text: No manuel, the base pieces did not fit. How can I return it? I don't have the original package

customer_reviews.title: My grandaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old grandaughter loves her bar! She's on it every day. The installation was not that hard but my husband had to pound the metal legs with a 2x4 and a hammer to get them to fit together! Also, the floor support legs should be a bit longer so the bar won't move as much while she's doing flips on it. Overall, I think it's a good buy.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent for my 5 year old. Assembly instructions could be improved but final product is great.

customer_reviews.text: These bars are very sturdy and well made. I ordered one for my 7 year old granddaughter and my other 6 year old granddaughter loved it so much, I had to order another one! They love it.

customer_reviews.text: I got this item for my daughter's 10th birthday and she was super excited. Very easy to put together and the item is very sturdy. She started gymnastics last year and wanted her own bar because she was having trouble in the sessions on the bars, but now she's a pro. And she loves the color. I would recommend this item.

customer_reviews.text: This is our second bar from amazon. The first one was a different brand. It was not study at all and the wood bar wasn’t smooth so we returned it. This bar is so much better! VERY sturdy and the bar is really nice and smooth!

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bar is amazing!!! My 5 and 8 year olds gymnasts love it. Easy to assemble, easy to adjust, durable, well worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but a little unstable at full height for doing tricks.

customer_reviews.title: The bar is not stable at all for kips. ...
customer_reviews.text: The bar is not stable at all for kips. It tips if there is any kind of motion besides my daughter standing directly under it and doing a pull over. She is about 50 lbs and it still shakes when she tries to do a kip, which is why we bought the bar in the first place. A mat has done little to stabilize it either. So bummed...
customer_reviews.author: Ann Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 48 pound daughter!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter, a 48 pound gymnastics powerhouse, loves this thing! She’s on it every day and her bars routine is improving! It was easy to assemble and it’s pretty sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Not Safe
customer_reviews.text: Bought this July 2018...It is December now. The bolts that hold the bar bent, and my daughter is only 90 pounds. This should never happen. Not safe. Within 3-4 months the bolts bent. Don't know what recourse I have.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: I have nothing bad to say about this bar we got it for my daughter for Xmas. It is now June and it has been perfect she uses it every day. It’s steady and it was not difficult for my husband to put together. And it is easy to adjust the bar height. Great quality!!!

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great for my eight year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and great for my eight year old daughter. She has spent hours on it since she received it for Christmas. We will have to put some weights on the bottom as it does shift when she swings on it. We got a mat as well that she uses under it.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Definitely what we were looking for and nice and sturdy. Highly recommend a mat for underneath and easy to assemble.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service plus easy set up

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: HIGH QUALITY! FAST SHIPPING! We thought about buying this for years for our daughter. Wish we had purchased when we were just thinking about it! Excellent quality!

customer_reviews.text: Assembling it was a pain because my wooden bar was missing holes and Christmas Eve was the only time I had to put it together. Nevertheless I got it done.

customer_reviews.title: Quality bar.. won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bar for home use! My 9yo daughter and friends used it all Christmas break.... and my 6yo son loves it too :) Good choice on “Santa” present! Easy to put together... took 30 mins.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to lower and raise
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. Built very well. Easy to lower and raise.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not stable without the extension bars for a child over 60 lbs.

customer_reviews.title: Great for little gymnasts!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, well built. Easy to put together also! Only problem we had was a few minor cosmetic flaws.
customer_reviews.author: kelsey swanger

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and strong!
customer_reviews.text: This bar for us is great, it helps her so much being able to practice at home. She has progressed 10 fold since we did. I think it's going to actually save us money because she is moving up fast now and not wasting any time with her lessons. Also I bought the matching balance beam from the manufacturer and that is just as nice and very sturdy and strong as well. I am glad we spent a little extra and bought these two pieces because I'm sure they will hold there value and we will be able to sell them after she is done with them. Definitely built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Sturdy

customer_reviews.title: What is the weight limit ?
customer_reviews.text: So far the kid's love it. What is the weight limit?

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy .  There is a 50% chance you will not receive all the pieces
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy!!! Received all the bottom pieces but nothing for the top. It States that This may come into separate packages but the 2nd package has never come.Seems like it would be a really nice bar if we had all the pieces. Now the only option I was given was to do a return and refund. they cannot just simply send me the pieces I need. Way to go devastating a 8 year old little girl that has been saving up her money for months.

customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and was as advertised.. good for beginners and for kids just having fun.

customer_reviews.title: I received this product. But I have confirmed that ...

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little gymnast who always wants to practice!
customer_reviews.text: 8 yo daughter loves! Great set for home to practice. She weights about 50# as does make the bar jump a little when doing dismounts. We purchased sand bags at Lowes and set on lower bars and it doesn't move at all now. Love bars, great product! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of twins+1

customer_reviews.title: Challenging Build, Great bar
customer_reviews.text: With absolutely no instructions to put this thing together it was a guessing game. After 30 mins of trying to get the 2 connecting pieces that go under the mat to go on the outsides of the Tbar, we realized that it goes on the inside. There are no predrilled holes in the bar either. So you will need a drill. But, the bar is made well and my daughter loves it! So do all of her friends.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together

customer_reviews.text: Package was in shreds. Missing most of the parts. The silver extension pieces, the cross beams between the footings and the bar all missing from the package. Come on?!?! SMH...

customer_reviews.title: It's a Great home bar
customer_reviews.text: I surprised My 11yr old daughter with this & she loves gymnastics I set it up in my basement & I can't keep her from the basement now after she learns something in her gymnastics class she can't wait to come home to practice what she learned. It's a Great home bar!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mo'nique

customer_reviews.title: This item saved Christmas. My daughter is 10. ...

It took some significant pounding to assemble the leg braces that it comes with, but I'd much rather they be tight than loose.

customer_reviews.title: it's great! Seems to be good quality and have a ...
customer_reviews.text: There was a bend in the medal that was stopping me from getting it together. I had to hammer the medal out to force it to fit, but once it was in, it's great! Seems to be good quality and have a high level of stability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unstable
customer_reviews.text: This bar was very unstable and my daughter can’t use it without it moving a lot, this bar was also slightly broken.
customer_reviews.author: David Chai Saeteurn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Good quality. My daughter loves it. Would purchase again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Traig E Born

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy and it's great
customer_reviews.text: This was for my niece for her birthday. It's sturdy and it's great! So good she got 2nd place in her next meet on the bars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is good quality
customer_reviews.text: Box was damaged upon arrival. The product itself is good quality
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

product_meta.title: Z ATHLETIC Gymnastics Expandable Kip Bar
feature_bullets: NEW and IMPROVED - We've been designing horizontal bars for over a decade and are excited to share our newest Kip Bar with extended legs and flat crossbars! We take feedback very seriously and improve based on recommendations.
STURDY - Built with steel legs & the rail has a high-quality fiberglass core, making the direct pull-down weight limit 300lbs & the usage limit 120lbs. Bar is now made to last to Gymnastics level 3-4
ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT – Easy to adjust bar from 36"-58” so it can be used at multiple ages and heights. Now with longer base legs, no need for an extension kit!
EASY ASSEMBLY - With less than 10 bolts and the only tool required is a wrench, assembly is easy and quick. Excellent over the phone assistance if you run into any issues
SAFE & DURABLE – Two-year and product is lead free and meets all CPSIA standards. If your item is damaged during shipping contact Z Athletic directly.
